page.title: 11GURNARD SHOPS.
page.content: We made a shopping survey.We went on Thursday morning when the library van comes to the village.We asked people questions outside the Post Office and outside Mr.Dow's shop.Nearly everyone was going to Mr.Dow's shop because he sells food and vegetables and fruit.We asked"Do you need more shops?"Lots of people said "a chemist's shop",because there are a lot of old people in the village and they can't get into Cowes to get their perscriptions.Some people wanted a fish shop so that they could buy fresh instead of frozen fish. Everyone we asked comes to the shops more then once a week. some people come shopping every day.People said the shops in Gurnard are very friendly.
